descrizione: Build networks, grow industries, and navigate the world of the Industrial Revolution.

Build an intergalactic empire through trade, research, conquest and grand politics.
Compete with rival CEOs to make Mars habitable and build your corporate empire.

nome: War of the Ring Second Edition

descrizione: Rewrite history as you build up your civilization in this epic card drafting game.
